hero_description_1: We are 2A Farm S.R.L., a young company with 100% Romanian capital, established and authorized by ANM-DM in 2011. Our main activity is the distribution of medicines to independent pharmacies nationwide.
hero_title_2: Everything you have to know about us
hero_description_2: As for financial performance, we can tell you that in 2019 we achieved a turnover of over 116 million lei.
hero_description_3: Discover the world of 2A Farm and enjoy our products!
full_bg_component_title_1: Who are we, 2A Farm? Find out now!
full_bg_component_description_1: We operate a state-of-the-art pharmaceutical warehouse (authorized by the National Agency for Medicines) and a significant fleet of temperature-controlled transportation for medicines (15-25 °C and 2-8 °C, according to the new GDP guidelines). Through our innovative logistics, we ensure the distribution of any product to all 2A Farm customers within 24 hours.
full_bg_component_title_2: Who are we, 2A Farm? Find out now!
full_bg_component_description_2: We operate a state-of-the-art pharmaceutical warehouse (authorized by the National Agency for Medicines) and a significant fleet of temperature-controlled transportation for medicines (15-25 °C and 2-8 °C, according to the new GDP guidelines). Through our innovative logistics, we ensure the distribution of any product to all 2A Farm customers within 24 hours.
image_and_content_component_description_: Currently, we have over 100 employees and more than 4500 products in our portfolio, serving over 1000 clients from almost all over Romania.
